price: 28. ¡Ay de mí! ¡Ojalá no hubiese tomado a fulano por amigo!
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yāwaylatā laytanī lam attakhidh fulānan khalīlan
